description:
Scott has been a cheerleader for 7 years.
"Ever since middle school," he said. "I love gymnastics and I have a lot of fun doing it."
In high school, he described himself as "Ferris Bueller."
"I pretty much got along with everyone," he said.
Now he's in college and is cheering there as well.
"We're all friends," he said, referring to the other guys on his cheer squad. "They're 50/50 gay/straight, so it's a good mix."
On which "side" does he fall? I don't know, as he was kind of evasive about it. Maybe after he gets more comfortable, he'll open up a little bit.
I think it will be fun to find out! He's got a perfect bubble butt, and I would love to see it get fucked!!
title: Scott
